channel.title: Arts-Related Events Today
channel.description: RSS feed of arts-related events (artworks, books, other arts) that happened on this day in history.

item.title: List of Animorphs books
item.description: This is a list of all books in the Animorphs series by K. A. Applegate. For a list of authors who ghostwrote much of this series using Applegate's name, see Animorphs § Ghostwriters.

item.title: Programme (booklet)
item.description: A programme or program (see spelling differences) is a booklet available for patrons attending a live event such as theatre performances, concerts, fêtes, sports events, etc. It is a printed leaflet outlining the parts of the event scheduled to take place, principal performers and background information. In the case of theatrical performances, the term playbill is also used. It may be provided free of charge by the event organisers or a charge may be levied.
